attributes.action: We the people demand the return of £50 million pledged to Ukraine by PM R Sunak.
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government is continually raising taxes while giving taxpayer money away. This needs to stop immediately. The UK PM and UK Government do not have permission to give UK tax payer money away
attributes.background: Return of the £50 million of tax payer money the PM has just pledged 19-11-22. Stop giving away UK Taxpayer money to other countries without a referendum on each amount. Let the tax payer decide where the money is to be spent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628549
